title: 使用pm2部署服务器
text: 12345678910111213141516171819202122232425262728293031323334353637383940414243444546474849505152535455565758596061626364656667686970717273747576777879808182838485xfeng@xfzn:~$ ls~ app.jsxfeng@xfzn:~$ pm2 start app.js -------------__/\\\\\\\\\\\\\____/\\\\____________/\\\\____/\\\\\\\\\_____ _\/\\\/////////\\\_\/\\\\\\________/\\\\\\__/\\\///////\\\___ _\/\\\_______\/\\\_\/\\\//\\\____/\\\//\\\_\///______\//\\\__ _\/\\\\\\\\\\\\\/__\/\\\\///\\\/\\\/_\/\\\___________/\\\/___ _\/\\\/////////____\/\\\__\///\\\/___\/\\\________/\\\//_____ _\/\\\_____________\/\\\____\///_____\/\\\_____/\\\//________ _\/\\\_____________\/\\\_____________\/\\\___/\\\/___________ _\/\\\_____________\/\\\_____________\/\\\__/\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\_ _\///______________\///______________\///__\///////////////__ Production Process Manager for Node.js apps with a built-in Load Balancer. Start and Daemonize any application: $ pm2 start app.js Load Balance 4 instances of api.js: $ pm2 start api.js -i 4 Monitor in production: $ pm2 monitor Make pm2 auto-boot at server restart: $ pm2 startup To go further checkout: http://pm2.io -------------[PM2] Spawning PM2 daemon with pm2_home=/home/xfeng/.pm2[PM2] PM2 Successfully daemonized[PM2] Starting /home/xfeng/app.js in fork_mode (1 instance)[PM2] Done.┌──────┬──────┬────────┬───┬─────┬───────────┐│ Name │ mode │ status │ ↺ │ cpu │ memory │├──────┼──────┼────────┼───┼─────┼───────────┤│ app │ fork │ online │ 0 │ 1% │ 17.5 MB │└──────┴──────┴────────┴───┴─────┴───────────┘ Use `pm2 show <id|name>` to get more details about an appxfeng@xfzn:~$ pm2 list┌──────┬──────┬────────┬───┬─────┬───────────┐│ Name │ mode │ status │ ↺ │ cpu │ memory │├──────┼──────┼────────┼───┼─────┼───────────┤│ app │ fork │ online │ 0 │ 0% │ 31.7 MB │└──────┴──────┴────────┴───┴─────┴───────────┘ Use `pm2 show <id|name>` to get more details about an appxfeng@xfzn:~$ pm2 show app Describing process with id 0 - name app ┌───────────────────┬───────────────────────────────────────┐│ status │ online ││ name │ app ││ restarts │ 0 ││ uptime │ 57s ││ script path │ /home/xfeng/app.js ││ script args │ N/A ││ error log path │ /home/xfeng/.pm2/logs/app-error-0.log ││ out log path │ /home/xfeng/.pm2/logs/app-out-0.log ││ pid path │ /home/xfeng/.pm2/pids/app-0.pid ││ interpreter │ node ││ interpreter args │ N/A ││ script id │ 0 ││ exec cwd │ /home/xfeng ││ exec mode │ fork_mode ││ node.js version │ 8.4.0 ││ watch & reload │ ✘ ││ unstable restarts │ 0 ││ created at │ 2017-09-06T08:04:33.484Z │└───────────────────┴───────────────────────────────────────┘ Code metrics value ┌────────────┬────────┐│ Loop delay │ 0.34ms │└────────────┴────────┘ Add your own code metrics: http://bit.ly/code-metrics Use `pm2 logs app [--lines 1000]` to display logs Use `pm2 monit` to monitor CPU and Memory usage app 123456789const http = require('http')http.createServer(function(req,res) { res.writeHeader(200,{'Content-Type':'text/plain;charset=utf-8'}) res.end('welcome !-----啸风在学习～！-----')}).listen(8888) console.log('server running on http://116.62.23.242/')

# 当主机域名和IP地址对应的两个HostKey值不一致时，会给出类似如下警告：解决方案：删除掉旧的HostKey值记录，下次重新保存新的就行。 ➜ ~ vi /Users/xfeng/.ssh/known_hosts 123456789101112➜ ~ ssh_xfengThe authenticity of host '116.62.23.242 (116.62.23.242)' can't be established.ECDSA key fingerprint is SHA256:gPffWNoagMbaD0lJ1hEx3sUSKRyUzCeDJ0ktxFEuJlk.Are you sure you want to continue connecting (yes/no)? yesWarning: Permanently added '116.62.23.242' (ECDSA) to the list of known hosts.root@116.62.23.242's password: Welcome to Ubuntu 14.04.5 LTS (GNU/Linux 4.4.0-85-generic x86_64) * Documentation: https://help.ubuntu.com/Welcome to Alibaba Cloud Elastic Compute Service !root@xfzn:~#

title: 增强服务器安全等级
text: 1234567891011121314151617181920# Package generated configuration file# See the sshd_config(5) manpage for details# What ports, IPs and protocols we listen forPort 39999# Use these options to restrict which interfaces/protocols sshd will bind to#ListenAddress ::#ListenAddress 0.0.0.0Protocol 2# HostKeys for protocol version 2HostKey /etc/ssh/ssh_host_rsa_keyHostKey /etc/ssh/ssh_host_dsa_keyHostKey /etc/ssh/ssh_host_ecdsa_keyHostKey /etc/ssh/ssh_host_ed25519_key#Privilege Separation is turned on for securityUsePrivilegeSeparation yes# Lifetime and size of ephemeral version 1 server keyKeyRegenerationInterval 3600ServerKeyBits 1024 操作之前，打开两个终端登录服务器。 修改port范围：0～65535 0～1024 系统占用 修改端口 39999，保证UseDNS no 增加一行： 关闭 root

title: 搭建Nodeis生产环境
text: sudo apt-get update升级一下，再安装工具 1sudo apt-get install vim openssl build-essential libssl-dev wget curl git 再安装nvm，到nvm的github：https://github.com/creationix/nvm 1wget -qO- https://raw.githubusercontent.com/creationix/nvm/v0.33.3/install.sh | bash 重新打开一个终端，安装nodejs：nvm install 版本号 123456789101112131415xfeng_manager@iZbp16xc9vyo6w6lbv6di4Z:~$ nvm install v8.4.0Downloading and installing node v8.4.0...Downloading https://nodejs.org/dist/v8.4.0/node-v8.4.0-linux-x64.tar.xz...######################################################################## 100.0%Computing checksum with sha256sumChecksums matched!Now using node v8.4.0 (npm v5.3.0)Creating default alias: default -> v8.4.0xfeng_manager@iZbp16xc9vyo6w6lbv6di4Z:~$ nvm use v8.4.0Now using node v8.4.0 (npm v5.3.0)xfeng_manager@iZbp16xc9vyo6w6lbv6di4Z:~$ nvm alias default v8.4.0default -> v8.4.0xfeng_manager@iZbp16xc9vyo6w6lbv6di4Z:~$ node -vv8.4.0xfeng_manager@iZbp16xc9vyo6w6lbv6di4Z:~$ 使用淘宝镜像： 1npm --registry=https://registry.npm.taobao.org install -g npm 123456789101112131415161718192021xfeng_manager@iZbp16xc9vyo6w6lbv6di4Z:~$ echo fs.inotify.max_user_watches=524288 | sudo tee -a /etc/sysctl.conf && sudo sysctl -psudo: unable to resolve host iZbp16xc9vyo6w6lbv6di4Zfs.inotify.max_user_watches=524288sudo: unable to resolve host iZbp16xc9vyo6w6lbv6di4Zvm.swappiness = 0net.ipv4.neigh.default.gc_stale_time = 120net.ipv4.conf.all.rp_filter = 0net.ipv4.conf.default.rp_filter = 0net.ipv4.conf.default.arp_announce = 2net.ipv4.conf.lo.arp_announce = 2net.ipv4.conf.all.arp_announce = 2net.ipv4.tcp_max_tw_buckets = 5000net.ipv4.tcp_syncookies = 1net.ipv4.tcp_max_syn_backlog = 1024net.ipv4.tcp_synack_retries = 2net.ipv6.conf.all.disable_ipv6 = 1net.ipv6.conf.default.disable_ipv6 = 1net.ipv6.conf.lo.disable_ipv6 = 1fs.inotify.max_user_watches = 524288fs.inotify.max_user_watches = 524288xfeng_manager@iZbp16xc9vyo6w6lbv6di4Z:~$ 1npm --registry=https://registry.npm.taobao.org install -g cnpm 安装工具 1npm i pm2 webpack gulp grunt-cli -g 访问不了，需要修改防火墙,同时需要在阿里云后台添加安全规则。 静态站点， 持续稳定端口80访问 使用pm2

title: mac下配置subl启动sublime text 编辑器
path: 2017/09/04/mac下配置subl启动sublime text 编辑器/
text: 其实很简单，只要做软链即可。 1sudo ln -s /Applications/Sublime\ Text.app/Contents/SharedSupport/bin/subl /usr/local/bin/subl 如果是2的话 1sudo ln -s /Applications/Sublime\ Text\ 2.app/Contents/SharedSupport/bin/subl /usr/local/bin/subl 这样在工作中会方便许多 用法很简单 cd to/pathsubl .

title: 远程登录服务器
text: 使用SSH远程登录服务器ssh 指令登录服务器：ssh root@IP地址 xfeng$ ssh root@115.61.22.241123456789101112The authenticity of host '115.61.22.241 (115.61.22.241)' can't be established.ECDSA key fingerprint is SHA256:3PzSbEZ1o1jctQK5hyeUt136Yo1kTJe1MMSwVQK7+kM.Are you sure you want to continue connecting (yes/no)? yesWarning: Permanently added '115.61.22.241' (ECDSA) to the list of known hosts.root@115.61.22.241's password: Welcome to Ubuntu 14.04.5 LTS (GNU/Linux 4.4.0-85-generic x86_64) * Documentation: https://help.ubuntu.com/Welcome to Alibaba Cloud Elastic Compute Service !root@iZbp16xc9vyo6w6lbv6di4Z:~# 注：操作的时候，不要使用中文输入法，避免带入中文字符 ls查询系统内容1234root@iZbp16xc9vyo6w6lbv6di4Z:~#lsroot@iZbp16xc9vyo6w6lbv6di4Z:~# ls -a. .. .bashrc .cache .pip .profile .pydistutils.cfg .sshroot@iZbp16xc9vyo6w6lbv6di4Z:~# 123456789101112131415161718192021root@iZbp16xc9vyo6w6lbv6di4Z:~# fdisk -lDisk /dev/vda: 42.9 GB, 42949672960 bytes255 heads, 63 sectors/track, 5221 cylinders, total 83886080 sectorsUnits = sectors of 1 * 512 = 512 bytesSector size (logical/physical): 512 bytes / 512 bytesI/O size (minimum/optimal): 512 bytes / 512 bytesDisk identifier: 0x000e2ccb Device Boot Start End Blocks Id System/dev/vda1 * 2048 83884031 41940992 83 Linuxroot@iZbp16xc9vyo6w6lbv6di4Z:~# df -hFilesystem Size Used Avail Use% Mounted onudev 484M 4.0K 484M 1% /devtmpfs 100M 360K 99M 1% /run/dev/vda1 40G 1.8G 36G 5% /none 4.0K 0 4.0K 0% /sys/fs/cgroupnone 5.0M 0 5.0M 0% /run/locknone 497M 0 497M 0% /run/shmnone 100M 0 100M 0% /run/userroot@iZbp16xc9vyo6w6lbv6di4Z:~# 添加用户 123456789101112131415161718root@xfzn:~# adduser xfengAdding user `xfeng' ...Adding new group `xfeng' (1000) ...Adding new user `xfeng' (1000) with group `xfeng' ...Creating home directory `/home/xfeng' ...Copying files from `/etc/skel' ...Enter new UNIX password: Retype new UNIX password: passwd: password updated successfullyChanging the user information for xfengEnter the new value, or press ENTER for the default Full Name []: xfeng Room Number []: 418 Work Phone []: 13732102830 Home Phone []: 13732102830 Other []: Is the information correct? [Y/n] Yroot@xfzn:~# 添加sudo权限 123__root@xfzn:~# gpasswd -a xfeng sudoAdding user xfeng to group sudoroot@xfzn:~# sudo visudo 使用xfeng登录 1234567891011121314151617sshxfeng xfeng@116.62.23.242's password: Welcome to Ubuntu 14.04.5 LTS (GNU/Linux 4.4.0-85-generic x86_64) * Documentation: https://help.ubuntu.com/The programs included with the Ubuntu system are free software;the exact distribution terms for each program are described in theindividual files in /usr/share/doc/*/copyright.Ubuntu comes with ABSOLUTELY NO WARRANTY, to the extent permitted byapplicable law.Welcome to Alibaba Cloud Elastic Compute Service !xfeng@xfzn:~$ 无密码登录服务器 配置公钥、私钥 1234➜ ~ cd .ssh➜ .ssh lsgithub_rsa github_rsa.pub id_rsa id_rsa.pub known_hosts➜ .ssh ssh-keygen -t rsa -b 4096 -C “邮箱” eval “$(ssh-agent -s)” 1234567891011121314151617181920212223242526272829303132xfeng@xfzn:~$ ssh-keygen -t rsa -b 4096 -C "wangchao@xf-studio.com"Generating public/private rsa key pair.Enter file in which to save the key (/home/xfeng/.ssh/id_rsa): Created directory '/home/xfeng/.ssh'.Enter passphrase (empty for no passphrase): Enter same passphrase again: Your identification has been saved in /home/xfeng/.ssh/id_rsa.Your public key has been saved in /home/xfeng/.ssh/id_rsa.pub.The key fingerprint is:d2:45:91:27:72:65:25:8f:c3:7a:90:29:7f:f5:f9:47 wangchao@xf-studio.comThe key's randomart image is:+--[ RSA 4096]----+| o++.. || ..+=.+ || .o=o+ o || . + o o ..|| . S o o .E|| . o ..|| o|| .|| |+-----------------+xfeng@xfzn:~$ cd .ssh/xfeng@xfzn:~/.ssh$ lsid_rsa id_rsa.pubxfeng@xfzn:~/.ssh$ xfeng@xfzn:~/.ssh$ cdxfeng@xfzn:~$ eval "$(ssh=agent -s)"-s: command not foundxfeng@xfzn:~$ eval "$(ssh-agent -s)"Agent pid 1541xfeng@xfzn:~$ 1234567891011xfeng@xfzn:~$ cd .ssh/xfeng@xfzn:~/.ssh$ chomod 600 authorized_keys No command 'chomod' found, did you mean: Command 'chmod' from package 'coreutils' (main)chomod: command not foundxfeng@xfzn:~/.ssh$ chmod 600 authorized_keys xfeng@xfzn:~/.ssh$ sudo service ssh restart [sudo] password for xfeng: ssh stop/waitingssh start/running, process 1654xfeng@xfzn:~/.ssh$

path: 2017/07/05/《一本正经搞开发-智能插座篇》项目需求分析/
text: 一、项目需求分析对于项目需求分析，推荐大家可以看看火球的需求分析。 市场上的智能插座已经非常多了，我们去年接到客户的开发需求，客户的需求其实是对市场上某家插座的“仿制”。

title: 快速搞定NPM模块开发及问题解决
path: 2017/03/16/快速搞定NPM模块开发及问题解决/
text: 近期参加了组织“一起众创”，于昨晚见春哥的分享《3分钟搞定NPM模块开发》，随即敲起代码，其中遇到一些问题，止步于三分钟之外。 创建自己的模块组件第一步：创建目录创建工程目录 第二步：初始化初始化 第三步：创建index.js文件和test.js测试文件工程文件 index.js文件 test.js文件 第四步：测试test执行test文件 发布NPM模块第一步：注册账号到https://www.npmjs.com注册账号,记住自己的账号，密码，邮箱。 第二步：连接NPM连接NPM 第三步：发布发布 第四步：官网查看发布情况官网发布情况PUT 403 问题及解决方法 1.也是个人刚接触这块，很多处于小白的阶段，提交过程中出现了以下的问题并且找到解决方法：因为最初的http://registry.npmjs.org这个源国内用户访问非常慢，所以一开始我们可能换成了国内淘宝的镜像：http://registry.npm.taobao.org。但是淘宝这个镜像没有开放上传的权限，因此会报这样的错误： npm ERR! publish Failed PUT 403 npm ERR! Error: no_perms Private modeenable, only admin can publish this module: nodebb-plugin-route-cms 有至少两种方法： 1）修改~/.npmrc中的registry字段（命令：vi ~/.npmrc） 2）直接在命令行修改即可。 命令：npm set registry http://registry.npmjs.org 2.另一种情况，可能是当前发布的模块名已存在于NPM库，解决方法：在json文件中修改 模块名。 使用第一步：创建react项目第二步：项目结构第三步：安装xfeng_hello及安装后package.json的更新在此，非常感谢一起众创。欢迎大家加入一起众创。
